text: allahanu nimagenannu nidiruvano adarinda, (satkaryakke) kharcu madiri endu tam'modane helidagalella (avaru kadeganisiddare). Dhikkarigalu, visvasigalodane heluttare: Allahanu icchisiddare svatah avane yarige unisi biduttiddano, anthavanigenu navu unisabeke? Nivantu spastavagi darigetta sthitiyalliddiri
